Name: SGP Server Emulation
Author: Stefan Berg and the N.I.N.A. contributors

Descriptions.ShortDescription: A server emulation of the SGP API
Descriptions.LongDescription:
This plugin adds an API to the application that emulates the routes of SGP. This can be used for other applications to interface with N.I.N.A. that implement the SGP API.

**Plugin prerequisites**

- This plugin requires the installation of the ASP.NET Core Runtime 7.x.
- Please download and install this prior to using the plugin: [https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/7.0](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/7.0)

**Usage**

Once the plugin is installed, you need to enable it by going to the plugin page and toggle the "Server Enabled" button to on.
When enabled the server will be started.
